}}'''''Haradwaith''''' is a text-adventure made by [[Sam Ruby]].<ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=5 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 6 (retrieved 28 November 2010)</ref><ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/haradwaith.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 28 November 3010)</ref> It is the sequel to ''[[Return to Moria]]'' and the second - and final - part of [[Eamon (video game)|Eamon]]'s ''[[The War of the Ring (Eamon series)|the War of the Ring]]'' series. In this game the player must spy on [[Haradwaith]] for [[Gondor]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
